meta.name: Police Interceptors
meta.description: Follow the action-packed lives of the high-speed police interception unit. Led by specially trained officers and equipped with the fastest vehicles in the force, the team tackles the most difficult-to-catch criminals on a daily basis.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Officers are searching for a car containing a passenger suspected of assault and stalking, but the driver fails to stop and the pursuit heads towards the M1. In Northampton, a man with a history of violence wanted for multiple assaults earlier in the day is refusing to come quietly, leaving the interceptors no option but to take him down with 50,000 volts. Over in Silverstone, Callum and Chris are after a driver treating the holiday Inn car park as his very own racetrack, while a pursuit across multiple counties is finally brought to an end by Dan and the team, with a little help from the eye in the sky.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Officers are searching for a car containing a passenger suspected of assault and stalking, but the driver fails to stop and the pursuit heads towards the M1. In Northampton, a man with a history of violence wanted for multiple assaults earlier in the day is refusing to come quietly, leaving the interceptors no option but to take him down with 50,000 volts. Over in Silverstone, Callum and Chris are after a driver treating the holiday Inn car park as his very own racetrack, while a pursuit across multiple counties is finally brought to an end by Dan and the team, with a little help from the eye in the sky.

In Northampton, a man with a history of violence wanted for multiple assaults earlier in the day is refusing to come quietly, leaving the interceptors no option but to take him down with 50,000 volts. Over in Silverstone, Callum and Chris are after a driver treating the holiday Inn car park as his very own racetrack, while a pursuit across multiple counties is finally brought to an end by Dan and the team, with a little help from the eye in the sky.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Andy has a high-speed chase through a housing estate.

videos.title: Roads, Pavements and Back Allies
videos.overview: Damo and the firearms team tackle a supermarket gunman, while Gareth faces a death-defying pursuit along roads, pavements and back allies. An offender thinks he has got away from Kev and Mark, but they have other ideas, plus Jimmy Grieves faces down five angry men on a Hartlepool estate.

videos.title: Deadly Pursuits
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series. A collection of some of the most extreme chases the Interceptors have been involved in, including a hot pursuit through a housing estate and a face-off with a 20-ton farm truck.

videos.title: The Fatal Four
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series. Intrerceptor Kev reveals how to spot a drunk driver, before he gets behind a bolshy bandit with no regard for the speed limit, while Jacko follows an all-terrain tearaway.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series. Kev pepper-sprays a suspect resisting arrest, while Richie and his colleagues TPAC a stolen car in the snow, Spike raids a cannabis farm, and Paul rushes to rescue two people whose car is crushed by a falling tree.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Liam and police dog Vader bring down a fleeing suspect, Kev and Spike rescue a man trapped in an overturned car, Pete is forced to pull his taser, and Spike disguises himself as a pizza delivery boy to carry out an unconventional raid.

videos.title: Late & Lethal
videos.overview: A shocking insight into the world of night-time policing, packed with alcohol fuelled violent crime, burglaries and drink driving. Damien and Mark are forced to take drastic action against a violent suspect on New Years Eve, officers race to stop a drunk driver who is heading the wrong way up the M6 motorway, and a burglar takes the Interceptors on a late night pursuit.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Kev and Pete pursue a runaway car into a pitch-black farmer's field, Jacko takes part in a major heroin bust, and rookie police dog Elsa chases a runaway burglar through the streets of Middlesbrough.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Chris and Andy pursue a drug dealer through the back streets of Shotton, Kev tracks down a man who threatened drinkers with an axe, and Spike engages in a high-speed chase in the countryside.

videos.title: Fast & Furious
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series following police response teams in Durham and Cleveland. A pursuit ends in a flaming fireball for Damo and Nyci, Kev and Mark chase a gang of motorbike thieves, Jacko pursues a runaway car through a park, and Liam and police dog Vader go after a suspected thief.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series following the police interceptors of Durham and Cleveland. Dog handler Jimmy Grieves collars a thief in the act, the interceptors use the big red key to open the door of a drugs farm, and Darren Cawthorne deals with a driver who is literally kicking off. Meanwhile, at Durham Tees Valley Airport, the interceptors are called to assist with an emergency landing.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series. Interceptor Stu Chaney deals with an alleged assault and a missing crossbow, Amanda stokes discovers crack on the A19, Paul Faulkner nicks a bloodied drunk driver hiding on a rooftop, and a brand new patrol car takes a battering when Neil Armstrong helps TPAC a runaway MG.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series. Jacko leads the firearms squad against a man believed to own numerous weapons, a runaway rains roof tiles onto interceptors from the top of a building and a suspected car thief gives Dicko the slip before running straight into Paul.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series. Kev and Pete are in a high-speed pursuit involving our fine feathered friends, Jimmy and his dog Boas have their hands full when a dangerous weapon is found early in the morning, armed response teams are called out to deal with a drunken gunman, and Andy deals with an aggressive foul-mouthed drink driver intent on dodging the breath test.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Action-packed observational documentary series. Paul Jackson has his work cut out stopping a runaway van driver who is causing havoc, and a street disturbance leads Paul Faulker and Lee Wilson to stare down the barrels of a shotgun. Kev Salter and the team raid a cannabis farm and make a shocking discovery.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Ian pursues a trail of sparks left by a car thief.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: A training exercise primes the interceptors for the real thing, leading to a bumper drug haul. A quad biker evades Jacko, before having a change of heart.

videos.title: Drugs Bust
videos.overview: Kev Salter takes drastic action to stop a vehicle the cops suspect has class A drugs on board, and a nasty street fight leads to a taser being drawn.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Hoopsy chases a disqualified motorist, who hurdles two fences in his attempt to get away, while Damo deploys a stinger to stop a drink-driver.

videos.title: Deadly Pursuits 2
videos.overview: Action-packed special highlighting some serious cases, including a dangerous car thief intent on causing carnage, the pursuit of an unlicensed driver through a housing estate, a stolen JCB on the rampage and a chase after a suspected heroin user that takes a turn for the worse.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Tom tries to pull over a suspected petrol thief who is unwilling to stop, Mike corners a criminal in a text-book manoeuvre and Jim deals with someone who can't control his tongue or his bladder.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Gordo and Dan unleash their tasers to help arrest a knife-wielding teenager, Jim leads five units to box in a car suspected of carrying drugs, and Tim and Tom tackle a mouthy drunk who has crashed his van.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Cases include a raid on a suspected drug user whose door won't budge, a chase after a souped-up hot hatch and a late-night reveller in Nantwich town centre.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: The Interceptors come under attack from a gang of violent, armed robbers, and the boys in the 'Big Blue Van' respond to reports of bottles raining down on the streets.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Jim heads up a raid for a suspected drug dealer, Dan and Gordy respond to reports of an alleyway attack, and Jon goes on the hunt for a serial drug driver. Elsewhere, the interceptors combine forces when they fear that a gun-toting brawler may be on the loose.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Tim and Tom team up with Merseyside police to raid a house, and a van-load of taser-packing interceptors respond to an alleged assault with a meat cleaver.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Dog handler Bob hunts down a suspected knifeman, John wrestles with a drunken reveller, and a tattoo provides a clue to a major drugs bust.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Jenno joins a TPAC-takedown of a man suspected to be armed, Dan and Gordy hit the door of a suspected drug den, Ian nicks a driver who is so drunk that he cannot even put his shoes on the right feet, and Steve rushes to help a pregnant lady caught up in a three-car smash.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Jim and the team take to the road to spring a trap on suspected drug dealers, while Dan and Gordy track down a man seen roaming the streets armed with two knives. John picks up the pieces of an unbelievable multi-car pile-up, plus an early morning raid sees the Interceptors bust through doors in search of class-A drugs.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Observational documentary series. Jenno and Bucko race to assist when Jim is rammed by a runaway driver, and a have-a-go hero helps to tackle a runaway drug driver.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Sean uses the big red key to give a drug dealer a door knock he won't forget, Jim chases down a speeding driver which leads to some drug-related discoveries, Jenno gets a faceful of pepper spray, Jim handles a gobby drink driver and Tom hunts down a violent armed robber.

videos.title: Family Matters
videos.overview: Jacko tries to stop a suspect who throws a package out of the window during the chase, Liam and sniffer dog Louis are called in to help discover why a man was in such a hurry to flea from the cops, and a young driver claims he has been coerced into breaking the law by a family member.

videos.title: Pursuit and Youths
videos.overview: The skills of the interceptors are put to the test as they go in hot pursuit of reckless youths. Jacko is on the hunt for a wanted teenager, and the interceptors are hot on the heels of a stolen silver Micra.

videos.title: Hide and Seek
videos.overview: After a high speed pursuit, interceptor Liam Sewell hunts down a wanted teenager. Meanwhile, Jacko plays a game of cat-and-mouse with a youth who flees on foot.

videos.title: Cops and Conflict
videos.overview: Dog handler Mark Sheenan tracks down a suspect believed to be cultivating drugs, who won't come quietly. Interceptor Jules Bennett rushes to assist a fellow officer, and Jacko chases a runaway in a high speed pursuit.

videos.title: Future Crime
videos.overview: As criminals use ever more hi-tech means to break the law, the police must employ their own array of gadgets, from thermal imaging cameras to drones.

videos.title: After Dark
videos.overview: Presenters Rick Edwards and Ortis Delay are out with the police interceptors as they tackle the difficult night shift. Ortis is with Spike as they pursue a fleeing car that drives into a dead end, while Rick is with dog handler Ian as they're called to back up the firearms squad.

videos.title: Young and Reckless
videos.overview: The interceptors take on youngsters who cause carnage on our roads and put themselves and others in danger. Spike and dog handler Ian pursue a 20 year old drunk driver into a traveller's site. Ben goes head to head with a speeding boy racer.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: A door knock arrest snowballs into a fire-arms stand-off for Damo, Spike uncovers a stash of cannabis stored with lethal shotguns, police dog Ronnie lands right on top of a wanted man, and Ben legs it after a runaway driver.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Dog handler Darren has to call on all his powers of persuasion to try to end a rooftop stand-off, while Steve is forced to use his pepper spray when a suspect refuses to come quietly, and Tasers are drawn in a tense situation with a man who is armed with a knife.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: The pursuit of a white van tearing up the turf in Willington proves to be a family affair, a two-year-old German shepherd cross named Titan earns his spurs, and Paul is sent on a roundabout hunt for a drunk driver. And Sam discusses police policy with a disqualified driver who won't accept he's in the wrong.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Paul takes the lead in a dangerous high-speed pursuit through the streets of Stockton-on-Tees, while Justin is put in severe danger by a man who has allegedly been threatening the public with a dirty hypodermic needle. Damo leads the firearms team on a raid of a house where a man has been seen with a gun, and Spike hunts down a car, the owner of which is wanted for burglary and fuel theft.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Liam and police dog Titan are tracking suspects in a full-scale manhunt. Paul takes two drug dealers by surprise, and a man needs to be rescued from the River Wear. In Darlington, Damo finds a man unconscious after a punch-up and a suspicious driver tries to outfox the interceptors.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: Jacko and the firearms unit flush out a suspect after finding a homemade gun, while a 999 call leads to a drugs bust for Liam, and dog handler Justin sniffs out the truth when a mum and son tell some porkies over who a crashed a car.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: Jacko and the firearms team are called to house where a suspect is reported to posses a shotgun. Richie and Pete hunt down a drugged-up driver who escaped on foot after crashing his car, and dog handler Liam and his canine colleague Louie are part of a 20-strong team raiding two houses linked to a suspected drug dealer.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: A reverse ramming sends Chris reaching for german shepherd Ronny, Lee is confronted by a particularly mouthy motorist, Liam arrests a man who denies carrying out a shocking attack, tasers are drawn after a van driver causes carnage, and a wanted man holes up in a loft and refuses to come quietly.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Interceptor Spike takes the lead against a runaway car thief in one of the most challenging pursuits ever. Liam investigates a gang of suspected drug dealers from Nottingham. Meanwhile, a supposedly straightforward stop for Jacko snowballs into a late night showdown with an aggressive youngster.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Paul 'Jacko' Jackson is forced to draw his taser, leading to a shocking result. The gloves are off on a Halloween evening which turns out to be less fright night, more fight night. Liam Sewell discovers a new type of herbal pizza topping.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Damo is involved in a high speed pursuit, but the driver manages to give him the slip. The interceptors' eye in the sky then spots five runners from a crashed car. Dog handler Mo is called to a mansion, Jacko tackles an angry mob after taking down a dodgy scooter driver, and finally Spike and Pete stop a speeding motor driven by a fast talker.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Rookie interceptor Rachael faces a baptism of fire including a chase with a pregnant passenger, and a deluded motorist calls the police to report interceptor Chris for stealing his car.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: A failure to stop turns into a full-blown kidnapping situation. Liam and the team make a shocking discovery when a 14-year-old lad is found in possession of a bag of crack cocaine, cash and a knife.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: AJ and Richie are in pursuit of a van speeding through narrow country lanes. Jacko and the team box in a van carrying large quantities of cannabis. Plus, sparks fly when dog handler Justin and police dog Elsa capture two burglars on a building site.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: A runaway mugger rams Faulko off the road and puts him in hospital. The team hunts down the driver responsible. Meanwhile Liam locks up a rogue biker with the aid of patience, pepper spray and a heroic passer-by.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Dog handler Darren calls on all his powers of persuasions to try and end a roof-top stand-off. Spike breaks out a drug wipe for a teenage tearaway on two wheels, but will the biker heed his dad's wise words? Steve is forced to use his pepper spray when a suspect refuses to come quietly. And tasers are drawn in a tense stand-off with a man armed with a knife.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Chris and the team are in pursuit of a stolen Mazda M3, and the driver disappears into an industrial area. Chris' tracker dog Ronny has a twitchy nose but will this canine crime fighter manage to track down the villain?

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: For the first time, a pursuit is filmed from the suspect's perspective. Plus Liam and sniffer dog Louis help uncover thousands in cash and a 1/2m of class-A drugs.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Eight police cars and the eye in the sky hunt down a high powered Porsche Cayenne that is causing carnage. Undertaking at high speeds and goading the interceptors, the driver even manages to take out several police cars.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Pursued by a helicopter and a team of armed response vehicles, two men armed with machetes and a sawn-off shotgun make a dramatic escape on a motorbike. Dog handler Duncan joins the firearms squad to close the area and help hunt the villains.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: A suspect assaults Steve with his car keys, Charlie and Paul pursue a Corsa that stole fuel, and Chris and Sophie spot a bunny-hopping learner driver who already has eight points on his provisional license.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Ben and Matt find themselves on a high-speed pursuit which ends up on a road to nowhere, Kev and Spenner assist in a TPAC, while Carl and Wayne nearly become victims of a white-van man's dangerous driving.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Dog handler Steve rides to the aid of the armed response team after reports of a man drawing a gun on a pizza delivery driver, Charley and Wayne takeaway a drink driver at the drive thru, and Warren begins the foot pursuit to end all foot pursuits.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Sergeant Mick and the Operational Support Unit carry out a raid on a house with suspected drug activity, and uncover a cannabis farm in the loft. There is motorcycle madness on the streets of Wakefield, as Gav apprehends a biker risking his and other road users' lives by his reckless riding.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Interceptor Mick leads a team raiding two flats whose occupants are suspected of producing and selling spice. Duncan is involved in a high-speed pursuit, which ends with tracker dog Tia on the escaping offender's trail.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: A runaway driver flees an accident in a decommissioned ambulance, on the wrong side of the road, then crashes through a level crossing and ditches his ride on a live railway line. While a chopper tracks the suspect, cops frantically battle to close the railway line before a train ploughs through.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: A reckless driver gives Sergeant Steve the slip in bad weather. Ben has a run-in with an argumentative drink driver who fails three breath tests.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: A white van man makes a break for it after ploughing into a parked car, a suspect is not keen on wearing a set of cuffs, and the driver of a stolen car is brought to a halt thanks to some railings.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Kev and Spenner go in pursuit of a driver who is so drunk that he can't even keep his car on the road and the chase ends with shocking results. Elsewhere, dog handler Tony encounters a naked man stranded at the side of the road, and Sophie is forced to buy a treat for the entire team due to a rookie mistake.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: A gang of burglars breaks into a house and takes the keys to luxury cars. After the thieves flee in three stolen vehicles, multiple teams hunt them down with the police chopper. The first burglar is caught after a lengthy pursuit of a stolen Mercedes, which he abandons before running straight into the path of waiting officers. Once the occupants of a second stolen Merc are apprehended by the chopper team, Ben and Warren go after the third vehicle - which they are stunned to witness burst into flames.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: Dog handler Duncan and the firearms team find themselves in a tense stand-off with suspected drug dealers who could be armed, with German shepherd Ti sent in to search and discovering more than the unit bargained for. Steve has to deal with two teens, one who has crashed a stolen car, and the other who has been involved in a bar brawl, while Kev is poised to take out a car with a stinger.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: The programme returns after a mid-series break. A runaway driver rams a police car after a failed burglary and the suspects manage to give officers the slip, eventually ditching their vehicle and running off. Meanwhile, dog handler Duncan and his German shepherd Tia are after some late-night intruders in a school.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: A driver reverses his car into Bob's pursuing police vehicle three times before speeding down an off-road track, while handler Duncan and his trusty dog Tia are called in to search a house with an alarm that has been going off all night.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: Documentary following the work of a high-speed police interception unit, riding along with officers covering the West Yorkshire region, which includes Leeds, Bradford and Wakefield.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: Officers pursue an out-of-control car that hurtles wildly over a major junction and crashes between two trees. When it stops, the driver and passenger, who are miraculously unharmed, turn out to be 12. Police officers in West Yorkshire investigate a rise in cloned cars, a drunken driver has a tall story to tell, and an armed response vehicle pursues a speeding car across Huddersfield.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: Documentary following the work of a high-speed police interception unit.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: The Operation Reacher team executes a dawn raid on a suspected drug dealer, while Steven King and the Knife Crime team apprehend two lads with a history of carrying blades. Katie Eustace pursues a car that has failed to stop and is occupied by a very unusual criminal pairing in the form of a mother and her son.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Armed officers are called to a siege in suburbia after a licensed shotgun owner holes up in his heavily fortified home, threatening to hurt himself or anyone he thinks may harm him, and it is up to Sgt Lenny Bennett to begin negotiations.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Dan Machin and James Carrington are hot on the tail of suspects who reportedly stole a car at knifepoint and the pursuit comes to a dramatic climax when the officers put in a forced stop. Jen Ellse follows a van after it carried out a dangerous overtaking manoeuvre and discovers the driver thinks he has extraordinarily high tolerance for alcohol.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: The firearms team mobilises to tackle a suspect armed with a pistol, and hours into a nerve-shredding siege, the man emerges with a handgun and fires. Elsewhere, interceptors Rob and Dan join in the pursuit of a runaway hatchback, while the members of the knife crime team track down a suspect on a bike trying to evade capture in a park.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Officer Phil Broughton is hot on the heels of dangerous driver heading towards Nottingham city centre, while Lisa and Lewis deal with reports of gun shots heard down by the canal. Elsewhere, an altercation at a petrol station results in a woman assaulting officer Mark Haywood and taking a swipe at one of the camera operators.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Officers Gav Hall and Dan Mottishaw are in hot pursuit of a suspected drug dealer, but the two-wheeled tearaway runs out of road, flips his bike over and crashes into a hedge. Elsewhere, a man wanted for ABH gives interceptors Lewis Marshall and Darren Chalk the runaround, and Jen Ellse pulls over a suspected uninsured driver, who struggles to explain the fake plates in his boot.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: The firearms team are deployed to the address of a man allegedly armed with a gun who is threatening to harm himself or provoke a police shooting. In Mansfield, Spencer and Rob tackle a man in the street who is suspected of carrying a knife and making threats to stab his own mother, and officers deal with a driver who struggles to remember his own name.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: The firearms team are deployed to the address of a man allegedly armed with a gun who is threatening to harm himself or provoke a police shooting. In Mansfield, Spencer and Rob tackle a man in the street who is suspected of carrying a knife and making threats to stab his own mother, and officers deal with a driver who struggles to remember his own name.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Following police on a manhunt for a dangerous suspect, as dog-handler Jen and crime-fighting canine Quantum search in the dark for the assailant. A crackdown on cannabis cultivation leads police to 500,000 worth of Class B drugs farmed in a disused warehouse, and on the roads, a van with false plates causes complete carnage.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Jen and her dog Quantum search for a dangerous suspect who has form for assaulting police, while a crackdown on cannabis cultivation leads to a big haul in a disused warehouse. On the roads, a van with false plates causes complete carnage, ploughing up the pavement and getting wedged against a house.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Officers from the knife crime team give chase when a handcuffed suspect makes a break for it, but with his hands behind his back he soon face-plants into the tarmac. Meanwhile, stakes are high as the interceptors comb the streets for a man who has threatened to stab his former partner and harm her horse.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Lisa and Jim find themselves slipping and sliding through muddy fields as they go off-road in pursuit of a 4x4, while routine stop by the knife crime team leads a garage full of cannabis estimated to be worth tens of thousands of pounds. Meanwhile, Dan and Spence seize a Ford Focus apparently purchased at 1:00am, and an unlicensed 17-year-old driver folds under Rob's questioning.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: A dangerous driver who has breached his restraining order leads officers on a half-hour, white-knuckle ride across Nottinghamshire, with the suspect repeatedly avoiding the spikes of Bruce Arnold's stinger until it seems nothing can stop him safely.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: A dangerous driver tears across the pavement and takes off towards Nottingham city centre, and the firearms team tackles reports of an illegal gun. Meanwhile, a disqualified driver with no insurance and a pocket full of cannabis slips off a motorbike yards away from Rob and Dan's police car.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: The knife crime team stops a driver with a boot containing a box full of cannabis, which leads to a search of his house where police also find a cannabis grow in the loft. Elsewhere, Rob and Dan are in the right place at the right time when a drunk driver crashes right behind them.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Peugeot driver tries to give interceptor Ky Kirk the slip around the bumpy backstreets of Nottingham, leading Ky to send out an SOS to colleagues Rob and Dan. Ken and Adam spot a shifty lad taking a sneaky photo of them on his phone and, when they stop him and his mate, they're clean, but the interceptors suspect they are at risk of child criminal exploitation.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Tonight's action-packed episode starts with a hunt for a dodgy Fiesta. With the interceptors on its tail, the driver stacks it into a roundabout and the occupants go to ground.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Charlie and Wayne are in hot pursuit of a van, but the driver crashes the vehicle and runs off into the night. With the help of a tracker, officers hunt down a 17-year-old suspected of committing a serious robbery, while Matt and Brimmers are on the hunt for the driver of a 300,000 Rolls-Royce who is thought to be under the influence.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Coups and the team get behind a high-performance Mercedes that speeds away.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: The knife-crime team are faced with the growing threat of mamba, a synthetic cannabis substitute that can be laced with rat poison and alloy-wheel cleaner and has been connected to multiple fatalities in Nottinghamshire. Elsewhere, a pair of opportunistic burglars help themselves to a few bottles from a pub.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: The firearms team race to the scene of an alleged shooting, only to find themselves embroiled in an unconnected domestic incident. Elsewhere in the north of Nottingham, the knife crime team recognise the familiar face of a dealer they busted six months previously with a car full of cannabis.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Dog handler James 'Coups" Coupland chases down a boy racer in a Skoda on a dual carriageway. A young man is pulled over in a Vauxhall that is suspected of having cloned plates, and officers Lewis and Paul are dispatched to reign in a runaway shire horse on the A453.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Officers hunt for three teenagers alleged to have threatened a shopkeeper with a gun. Two are swiftly put in cuffs, but one suspect seems to have vanished into a block of flats. Elsewhere, Jen and her crime-busting canine Quantum are called to intercept a burglar who's ransacking a school in the dead of night.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: The firearms squad approach a man suspected of having a loaded crossbow in his flat. Officers raid two properties as they search for stashes of a synthetic cannabis substitute, and Jim and Ben pull over a driver who turns out to be over the legal limit and possessing cannabis and cocaine.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: The officers are on the tail of a fast-moving Astra that has been reported as stolen, and Paul and Rich learn the delicate art of balancing police work with vulnerable suspects. Elsewhere, in Mansfield, the knife crime team are hunting in packs to stop a vehicle connected to drug dealing.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: Officers Jim Carrington and Lewis Marshall hunt down a familiar foe - a Citroen Picasso that has given cops the slip three times in a week. Meanwhile, the knife crime team are circling an estate, waiting for a suspected dealer to slip up, and an officer proves that age is no barrier by chasing down a young man less than half his age.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: An ill wind blows through Worksop tonight when a Ford Focus seemingly fails to stop for Lewis and Rich. The suspected driver is away on his toes, but police dog Quantum follows his nose to an outdoor toilet. Sure enough, hiding inside, a few yards from the runaway car, is a suspect who swears he's just dropped by to answer the call of nature - in a stranger's toilet.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Police dog Quantum follows his nose to find a runaway suspect. Elsewhere, the knife crime team arrest the same young man for the second time in a fortnight, and it appears no lessons have been learned when they conduct a search and find 20 wraps of suspected Class-A drugs.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: A Volkswagen driver proves a slippery customer, especially on wet roads, and even manages to evade the interceptors' stinger. But when he makes it to the M1 at speeds north of 90mph, the cavalry are called in to perform a breathtaking T-PAC straight out the top drawer.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Police Interceptors is back in Nottinghamshire for another series alongside the region's elite crimefighting units. In one of the most challenging years ever for law enforcement, this series features exclusive access to Nottinghamshire's traffic units, its knife crime team and armed response unit. Racing in performance patrol cars with the best drivers on the road, hunting with the dog unit in the undergrowth and peering through the sights of an automatic rifle, this is a high-octane documentary in the thick of the war on crime. Doors get smashed in dawn raids on drug dealers, shots are fired in a suburban siege and bad guys are chased at more than 100 miles per hour. The battle may have never been fiercer, but Nottinghamshire's finest are up to it.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: This all-action episode begins with reports of suspected lorry looters at a service station in Trowell, and firearms cops Jim and Lewis race to intercept. They arrive to find the stock seemingly abandoned, when nearby a figure bursts from the shadows and legs it into the undergrowth. Dog detectives take the lead on containment, and it's down to police dog Morse and his canine comrade Reno to sniff out the bad guys. Jon and Dan stop a road rage suspect who has allegedly racially abused another driver and threatened them with an axe. The bloke evidently has an axe to grind with the interceptors, too, and this charming encounter unearths more than just a weapon. Dj vu strikes, as the knife crime team nick a familiar face with a load of suspected cannabis in his mum's motor. The lad claims he uses the stash to whip up cannabis cakes and shakes  so much so the team think he could have set up shop. Meanwhile, there's another reunion in store for Lewis. One year on from a siege in suburbia, where a man fired an imitation pistol towards armed cops, he's made more threats towards police and the hunt is on to lock him up. Finally, having the windows down on a hot summer's day has Matt and Lee following their noses to weed out their next job. High speed, high drama and one hell of a ride. Buckle up for an all-new episode of Police Interceptors.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Fasten your seatbelts for today's episode as a high-performance motor smashes its way through rural Nottinghamshire leaving a trail of carnage across the county. The driver's rammed a cop car and his risking innocent lives on the roads has put him firmly on the list of Nott's most wanted. Now he's heading towards the city, and time is running out to get the runaway sports car stopped safely. After giving local units the runaround, it's up to Gav and Macca to intercept with some tactical contact, forcing a baby-faced driver to surrender. Meanwhile, the countywide ANPR system leaves a trail of breadcrumbs for Nottinghamshire's knife crime team when it picks up a cross-county criminal with previous for failing to stop. They quickly race to cut off any chance of escape. In St Ann's, it's friends re-united when Gav spots a familiar face. The suspected drug dealer claims to be living in his car, but the team find a set of house keys. The interceptors, ready to call his bluff, search an address nearby which turns up a grand's worth of weed and weapons. Jen and the team intercept a driver who gave cops the slip earlier in the day. It turns out that he blows almost twice the drink drive limit, but that's not the only issue Finally, Macca and Jon apprehend a shoplifter red meat' handed when he tries to leg it from M&S. Fast, furious and occasionally funny, it's another wild ride with Nott's finest in an allnew Police Interceptors.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Several units chase a white van that has been driven at four times the speed limit, until the driver eventually ditches the vehicle and goes for broke on foot. Meanwhile, following a report of a car on fire, the interceptors get behind a Mercedes A-Class suspected to have fled the scene. The suspect hightails it across town for several miles, before ditching clambering onto the roof of his car, where he takes a spectacular - and costly - tumble.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Dog handler Chris finds himself on the tail of a runaway Renault Clio, while Rob and Dan receive intel that a residential home is emitting a familiar aroma of marijuana. Meanwhile, the Knife Crime Team head out in force to the northern suburbs, where they suspect a drug-deal is about to happen. After a highly co-ordinated operation, the team smoke out the suspected main dealer and a search turns up almost 100 wraps of Class A's down his pants.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Jim and Lewis check out reports of suspected lorry looters at a service station in Trowell, with police dog Morse and his canine comrade Reno coming to the rescue. Jon and Dan stop a road rage suspect who has allegedly racially abused another driver and threatened them with an axe, while the Knife Crime Team arrest a familiar face with a load of suspected cannabis in his mum's car.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Dog handler Chris finds himself on the tail of a runaway Renault. The car is flying and when it hurtles round a blind bend, it rolls onto its roof.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Officers pursue a vehicle with obscured number plates and it charges off the wrong way down the A46, while Dan and Jules stop a disqualified driver who is in a unique disguise. Police also respond to a report of an alleged carjacking at knife point, and there are tears before bedtime for a car of teenagers.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: In one of the fastest pursuits in interceptor history, units mobilise to try to stop a 185mph superbike that is pulling wheelies, giving stinger teams the run-around, and even testing the flying skills of the National Police Air Support Unit. With the lives of other motorists at risk, the last resort is authority for tactical contact between cop car and the motorbike, but can advanced driver Paul Charlesworth pull it off?

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: On the A1, officers battle to stop a dangerous driver from careering down the carriageway in 18 tons of stolen lorry. After a successful strike with a heavy-duty stinger, the driver carries on until he runs out of road and takes his chances on foot. but he crosses the path of two security dogs on duty with their handler. Meanwhile, in Sutton-in-Ashfield, firearms cops Richard and Ash are forced to use the big red key when a wanted man refuses to open the door, and over in Hucknall, the results of a roadworthy check don't go down too well.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: The search is on for a stolen high-performance motor, reportedly used by suspects armed with baseball bats. Dan locates their target and after a pursuit, four suspects ditch the wheels and take their chances on foot. Phil faces an electric scooter stand-off when an illegal rider takes exception to being stopped.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A van driver repeatedly rams an officer's vehicle as he tries to escape and then tries his luck on foot, disappearing into an alleyway, but police dog Yogi soon sniffs him out in nearby gardens. Following reports of a wanted vehicle travelling towards the Nottinghamshire border from Lincolnshire, officers assemble on the A1 to put the brakes on it with a stinger.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Jim and Lisa lead an intelligence-led strike. Several suspects are on the move, and it's believed they're in possession of a handgun and ammunition. Five armed-response vehicles and a dog van form the convoy who perform a perfect double-box on two vehicles simultaneously, and a search of one of the cars throws up a few surprises.The Knife Crime Team are also working on intel, targeting drug hotspots. They nick a bloke in a residential area who appears to be dealing drugs. It doesn't take Gav long to find the wraps of suspected Class A's hidden in the man's trousers.On a Saturday night, Lee Frith pursues a Peugeot at frightening speeds around the city centre. Before long, a convoy of cop cars have come to assist, while the driver is blasting through red lights without a second thought. Sensing danger, Lee hangs back. Sure enough, the reckless driver ploughs into an innocent driver causing a massive fireball. Cops' starburst to deliver first aid to those in dire need of help.Another pursuit in Worksop sees Jay Simms tail a suspected car thief into a housing estate. When the driver realises the game's up, he bizarrely leaps out of his moving car. It doesn't take Jay long to peel him off the tarmac and get him in cuffs.And Phil Broughton pulls a dodgy-looking Beamer, but just how much of a banger this motor is, even surprises Phil.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Armed response officers join up with colleagues from the knife crime team to smoke out a lad who was seen brandishing a 12-inch blade on a residential estate. Meanwhile, several units hunt down a driver who's been running red lights, speeding at over 100mph and caused a crash while driving the wrong way on a dual carriageway.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Officers join forces with the National Police Air Service to stop two suspects in a car believed to have cloned plates. Units on the ground strike with a stinger, but that doesn't stop the driver from swerving off the road and taking the pursuit into cornfields. Following intel about a suspected drug dealer, the Roads Crime Team activates stealth mode and surround the suspect's vehicle.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Jules goes in pursuit of two men in a two-ton pick-up truck that is being driven at speeds of over 100mph and on the wrong side of the road. When the driver rams the officer's car multiple times, it's up to the rest of the team to take up the chase. Plus, a taxi driver is suspected of possession and intent to supply marijuana.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Firearms officers enter a property to discover an arsenal of weapons and a recently harvested cannabis crop, while they also deploy a team effort to stop a speeding Audi. Meanwhile, the Knife Crime Team's suspicions are aroused by a lad in a balaclava on a bright day and suspicions are further aroused when he tosses a bag in a garden and makes a run for it.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Sgt Mike Taylor and the Operation Reacher team come up empty-handed when they raid a suspected drug dealer's house, but find what appears to be three bags of heroin in the next-door neighbour's garden. In Bulwell, a man calls police claiming to have had his hire car stolen, and Paul Charlesworth and Toby Hardy manage to track the missing car down and find a stepdad and daughter, who are suspected of drug driving and drug possession respectively.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: An edition following the work of the firearms squad, with the team responding to reports of a sawn-off shotgun changing hands in the suburbs. When they swoop in, both buyer and seller don't know what's hit them. There's an early start for the team from Operation Reacher, who surprise a suspected dealer while he's trying to put his pants on - and a packet of cocaine falls to the floor in front of them.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: This high-octane episode kicks off with the interceptors in hot pursuit of a Ford Kuga. After a successful sting, the lads abandon the car and disappear into the woods. However, the dog unit is on hand to sniff them out.In Newark, Jon and Dan stop a motor suspected of being stolen in a keyless theft. They also discover something unsavory in one of the suspects' bags.Over in Radford, the Knife Crime Team track down a black Astra suspected of being involved in drug dealing. The driver manages to give them the slip, but Ken receives an earful from the irate passenger. However, Ken gets the last laugh as they discover crack in the bloke's sock.Nathan's copper's nose proves to be on the money as he spots a late-night drink-driver. The bloke behind the wheel reeks of booze, but is it his car?And Phil Broughton stops a ropey flatbed with an unsecured load. But it turns out to be the least of the driver's problems as Phil sniffs out more than just the loose tools in the back.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: The interceptors are on a mission to lock up a man wanted on suspicion of making threats to kill, who could have a knife. Rob and Dan stakeout the suspect's car, but they're so super stealthy that a driver reverses into them, blowing their cover. Their target seizes his opportunity to make a break for it, and what follows is a pursuit, decamp and dash, but the interceptors have got their running shoes at the ready.The Knife Crime Team nick a suspected drug dealer and find a mystery set of keys. Convinced their latest catch is hiding a big stash of drugs somewhere nearby, the team scour the area for the illusive lock-up and are happy campers when they discover the keys unlock a caravan with over 16,000 of cannabis inside.Out on the roads, Coups and police dog Rambo are on the lookout for a suspected shoplifter on the wanted list. As the interceptors get behind the suspects mum's car, it turns out it's find one get one free', as two blokes hop out and one is on his toes with Rambo close behind.Meanwhile, when a driver hits the gas on sight of the marked Skoda, Kingo and Jonny track down the lad and discover he's almost three times over the drink drive limit, with his dad in the car.And, finally, the good people of Mansfield are in for a long wait for their chippy tea, when Phil and Katie arrest a drugged-up delivery driver.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: Several units are on the tail of a white van being driven around town at four times the speed limit. After a tyre bursts, the driver continues for a while until he eventually ditches the vehicle and tries to escape on foot, but police dog Quantum is hot on his heels. Meanwhile, following a suspected arson attempt on a car, officers get behind a nippy Mercedes A-Class that they believe has fled the crime scene.

videos.title: Episode 16
videos.overview: Officers Gav and Neil pursue a silver van and a white Toyota believed to have been involved in a raid on a car hire firm, and the van rams the police car. Rob and Spence deal with a man who seems hellbent on unleashing mouthfuls of spit at the cops.

videos.title: Episode 17
videos.overview: A runaway car speeds through the Nottinghamshire countryside, a routine stop turns nasty, and an artist in a rush is clocked speeding at more than 100mph.

videos.title: Episode 18
videos.overview: Rich and Ash are on the trail of a potentially armed and dangerous man who's suspected of smashing up a property and spot him in a car park, but will he come quietly? Macca pursues a stolen Ford whose occupants run off into a field, while Phil Broughton stops a lad with a dodgy date of birth on his insurance.

videos.title: Episode 19
videos.overview: Several officers join in the pursuit of two men in a van, who are racing through four counties and leaving a trail of destruction in their wake - filming the entire thing on their phone as they ram multiple police cars. Another car takes a pounding when two men attack Sarge's new BMW with a crowbar and Macca is forced to pull his Taser on a driver who failed to stop.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Police Interceptors is back with unrestricted access to a new force: the elite crime-fighters of Northamptonshire Police. This all-action episode kicks off with interceptor Bertie tailing a fail-to-stop driver thrashing it at over a tonne. With speeds ramping up and the country roads narrowing, the pursuit is only going to end one way: the suspect stacks it at high speed and flips the car onto it's roof...

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Interceptors Keith and Charlie pursue a dangerous driver who is sailing through red lights, on the wrong side of the road, and clipping curbs. Gloves and ballies fly out the window - has this runaway got somethingto hide? Tarnia keeps patient when a drink driver subjects her to a torrent of abuse, but that calm approach wears out when the driver spits a torrent of saliva in Tarnia's face. And the commandeering of a bicycle kicks off one of the more unusual pursuits in Interceptor history, as pedal power puts a runway drug dealer behind bars.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Interceptors Alex and Josh head to HMP Five Wells, one of the biggest category C prisons in the UK. A man's been seen tossing suspicious parcels over the prison wall and when the boys arrive at the car park, they clock someone acting shifty in a hire car. Thousands of pounds worth of drugs destined for prison are seized in an instant. ANPR directs Callum and Rachael to a motor that's linked to drug offences. When they stop the car, its driver tosses bags of drugs into the boot and his mobile phone over a wall. But a more bizarre act follows. Stewart and Callum pull over a middle-aged driver whose motor appears not to have any insurance. The man of mystery provides two different names and two different dates of birth.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Harrison and Joe are thrust into a high-stakes pursuit when a driver's erratic behaviour signals imminent disaster. Harrison smashes the driver's window and Joe scrambles through shattered glass to grab the driver at the wheel. In Kettering, officers respond to a break-in. Chris and Stewart clear the house to find a cannabis grow, yet no one's home. Following intel, the boys in blue race to intercept multiple getaway vehicles suspected to be involved in the operation. On the A14, Stewart and Rachael nab a van for no insurance, MOT, or tax and - to top it off - the driver's banned from driving. Stewart's unamused by the driver's cheeky charm.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: A pair of potential car thieves are chased by pursuit units and drone, then nicked by police canine Rocky and the firearms squad. The couple caught in separate stolen cars have the honour of being busted by halfthe force. The Dog Unit are called to deal with reports of a man stealing fuel from parked vehicles - and the suspect is found cowering behind a water butt. Bomber drops a stinger on a van with cloned plates. It's adirect hit with the bed of nails and the unlicensed van man is soon brought to a standstill.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Unrestricted access to the elite crime-fighters of Northamptonshire Police. Camera crews ride with the highspeed Roads Policing Team and crack Dog Unit to grant a ringside seat in the fight against crime, bodyworn cameras capture thrilling arrests by the Armed Response Unit, and a bird's eye view is provided by the thermal imaging cameras of the National Police Air Service.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Officers from Northamptonshire's roads policing and firearms units join forces to stop an Audi that is being driven at 100mph, with the driver evading their first attempt to box him in. In Corby, two drunk and disorderly suspects kick off with the police and take an officer to the ground, while Griff and Scott pull over an 18-year-old unlicensed driver who has allegedly been taking selfies at the wheel.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: In Kettering, a wanted man abandons his car before running off into a park, with Sandra giving chase on foot, Tony using a drone, and handler Macca and his supreme sniffer dog Mac joining in. Matt arrests two over-the-limit football fans in the same evening, and Harrison and Tanya go on a mission to find out what a mystery driver is trying to hide.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: With unrestricted access to Northamptonshire Police, camera crews ride with the high-speed Roads Policing Team and crack Dog Unit to grant a ringside seat in the fight against crime

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Police Interceptors returns, now riding with Northamptonshire Police's elite force. This episode follows highspeed pursuits with the Roads Policing Team, thrilling takedowns by the Armed Response Unit, and sharptracking by the Dog Unit. With body cams and thermal imaging from the National Police Air Service, get front-row access to intense drug busts, high-octane chases, and taser arrests

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Op Revive raid a property linked to drug dealing. At the front the interceptors use the 'big red key' on a reinforced door, while around the back, bags of cocaine are being flung out of a window. Two suspected dealers are nicked - and one makes a bid for freedom. Harrison and James track down one of Corby's 'Most Wanted' in a car park, striking from the shadows with a surprise two-car box. Michael faces a race againsttime when an abandoned car goes up in flames on the A509.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: A runaway driver is brought to heel with the help of that trusty bed of nails known as a stinger. Unfortunately for Interceptor Rob Harfleet, the stinger team is so stealthy and efficient they take out his tyre too. The Firearms Squad moves in numbers to secure a wanted man who allegedly has guns in his possession. They raid the man's house at gunpoint and recover two suspected firearms, but the suspect is still at large. A manhunt ensues which ends 24 hours later with a ruck on the pavement bathed in the red lights of multiple tasers. Meanwhile, out on the roads a drink driver fails to keep a low profile, blasting out ragga in the dead of night.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: Interceptors chase a car suspected of carrying Class A drugs. After a failed pursuit, the suspect evades capture, but Macca eventually bags him with 250,000 worth of cocaine in the boot. Later, Paul and Rich join a manhunt for a suspect who crashed and fled - by car, by electric scooter, on foot and in a taxi -leaving behind key evidence. In the city centre, a stand-off between two men leads to chaos. The knife crime team nabs a runaway cyclist. And a serial speeder learns the hard way to stop for police.

videos.title: Episode 15
videos.overview: Harrison and Joe are thrust into a high-stakes pursuit when a driver's erratic behaviour signals imminent disaster. Harrison smashes the driver's window and Joe scrambles through shattered glass to grab the driver at the wheel. In Kettering, officers respond to a break-in. Chris and Stewart clear the house to find a cannabis grow, yet no one's home. Following intel, the boys in blue race to intercept multiple getaway vehicles suspected to be involved in the operation. On the A14, Stewart and Rachael nab a van for no insurance, MOT, or tax and - to top it off - the driver's banned from driving. Stewart's unamused by the driver's cheeky charm.

videos.title: Episode 16
videos.overview: Northamptonshire's Roads Police and Firearms Teams join forces to stop a driver making a 130mph getaway in a high-performance Mercedes. Op Revive go on a mission to clear up the county's wanted list. The team go on a stakeout to pick up a robber with a reputation for doing a runner, and elsewhere, Griff and Scott's routine stop of a driver not using their headlights, sheds light on a lad wanted for failing to appear at court.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: The documentary returns to follow Northamptonshire police once again. A routine check on an untaxed truck in Northampton quickly goes from nought to 100 when the irate owner sees red, while dog handler Lucy and her canine partner Bryn catch suspected lorry thieves in the act at a service station. A rush-hour crash sees a wrecked van left abandoned and wedged on top of railings at a pedestrian crossing, and Lloyd and Harrison spend the night shift catching up with a drink-driver in Kettering.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Officers from two counties chase a seven-and-a-half-ton runaway lorry, but just as it seems the chase will be aborted, the occupants bail out on a dual carriageway and flee into the woods. Meanwhile, a young driver is inches from disaster when the fence he crashes into passes straight through his engine bay, while there are worrying reports of a teenage kidnapping in Northampton.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Charlie's first solo pursuit is at 115mph when he tails a dangerous driver taking risk after risk, but the officer is forced to abort when the reckless suspect takes off down the A4 the wrong way. Following reports of three men armed with weapons, handler Steve and his police dog Blue join forces with the firearms team for an operation in Kettering. Sandra and Chris face a battle to bag a sample of breath from a suspected drink driver, who's lucky to be alive after ploughing into a roundabout, leaving exposed electrics and potentially smouldering wreckage in his wake.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: A dangerous driver in a stolen car causes havoc on the streets of Northampton and the firearms team carries out a high-speed tactical contact to bring it to a halt, but the four occupants fllee across the motorway. Following an attempted burglary on a cannabis factory in Kettering, officers embark in pursuit of a van seen leaving the area.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: As the sun sets over Northampton, Rob gets behind a suspected stolen van on the M1, but when the driver fails to stop, the officer buckles up for his first-ever pursuit. Assisted by armed response vehicles, Rob and the team must find that delicate balance between robust pursuit and road safety. In Wellingborough, Griff and Scott arrive at the aftermath of a suspected road-rage incident, and the main suspect stinks of booze.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Officers are joined by several firearms units, a helicopter and a drone as they track a group of men suspected of attempting to steal from parked lorries. However, it is police dog Bryn who becomes the star of the show, following a mile-long track through fields, a housing estate and a park, all the way to a bridge over a dual carriageway. Meanwhile, Charlie and Rob chase a van suspected of being on cloned plates, but the driver is reckless and dangerous, hitting high speeds while going the wrong way on roundabouts and dual carriageways.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: There is an alarming report of thieves wielding machetes in order to steal the keys to a BMW in London and the chase spills onto Northamptonshire's patch and all units head to the M1. But just as the cops are about to pounce, the bad guys slip through a gap in traffic and escape on the hard shoulder. A motorbike proves nearly as hard to pin down for Locky, who chases it up and down the county in the dark.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Firearms officers raid a house and recover two suspected weapons, but the suspect remains at large, sparking a 24-hour manhunt that ends in a Taser takedown. A fleeing driver is stopped by a stinger, but officer Rob Harfleet's tyre gets spiked too, while Interceptors Callum and Stewart deal with a drink-driver blasting ragga in the dead of night,

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Officers pursue a vehicle suspected of being involved in several car thefts and a search of the vehicle reveals cannabis and a nasty-looking sock containing a snooker ball. In Rushden, the Operation Revive team raids a house that has been converted into a cannabis factory, while Lucy and tracker dog Bryn chase a couple of runaways from a van that failed to stop and Bomber tackles a suspected drink-driver, who gives him the silent treatment and refuses to take the roadside breath test.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: A new VW Golf is reported stolen from a rental firm and Chris Lock is soon behind the vehicle, but its driver proves a handful and an armed response unit is called in to assist. Meanwhile, officers from Operation Revive execute a warrant, where they unearth a hiding place for suspected Class Bs, before seizing suspected cocaine from a teenager in a local park. Michael and Keith are called to a residential address where a lad has somehow managed to ride his vintage motorbike through a brick wall.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Officers embark on a pursuit in a bid to catch a group of suspects reportedly linked to an attempted stabbing. In Corby, dog handler Lucy and her canine crewmates are quick to respond when a driver legs it from a car that reeks of cannabis. Rachel and Callum set out to stop an 82-year-old with a revoked driving licence who is failing to stop on the M1.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: Officers are searching for a car containing a passenger suspected of assault and stalking, but the driver fails to stop and the pursuit heads towards the M1. In Northampton, a man with a history of violence wanted for multiple assaults earlier in the day is refusing to come quietly, leaving the interceptors no option but to take him down with 50,000 volts. Over in Silverstone, Callum and Chris are after a driver treating the holiday Inn car park as his very own racetrack, while a pursuit across multiple counties is finally brought to an end by Dan and the team, with a little help from the eye in the sky.
